title: Textile, "Watercolour Stripe", 1984
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed using 10 screens on plain weave foundation.
inscribed: Along each side, "WATERCOLOUR STRIPE By EDDIE SQUIRES For The Collection DESIGNER'S CHOICE Copyright (Symbol) MCMLXXXIV By Warner & Sons Limited (arow) Top (color registration dots)".
dimensions:
Warp: 252cm (991/4in). Weft> 143cm (56 1/4in.) Both selvedges present.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 63cm (24 3/4in)
description: Vertical stripes of multicolor alternate with narrower cream stripes. Width of pattern is 138.5 (54 1/2in.) leaving a margin at each side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Watercolour Stripe", 1984.
1984. Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed using 10 screens on plain weave foundation.. Gift of Eddie Squires. 1992-3-26.
